prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Mossingford Baptist Church Minute Book, 1823-1869. Accession 28981, Church Records Collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Lent for copying by Mrs. J. Carroll McKinney, 23 April 1975.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: This church was constituted in Charlotte County, Virginia in 1785. In 1865, the black members requested and were granted permission to organize a separate church.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These minutes cover the period from June 1823 to March 1869. Membership lists appear on pages 145-202.
